TEXT: A pile of different decks, each ready to deal with anything. NL A larger pool of powerful cards, but the stronger enemies come prepared.
NL You search for a winning hand...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~red~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
